LanguageData.AteVictoryMeal.stages.0.label: 进食了胜利之肉
LanguageData.AteVictoryMeal.stages.0.description: 胜利的味道总是如此甜美，滋润了我的身体和灵魂，敌人的肉真好吃！
LanguageData.IG_Catharsis.stages.0.label: 帝皇洗涤心灵
LanguageData.IG_Thought_MOOD.stages.0.label: 帝皇净化
LanguageData.IG_Thought_RoPT.stages.0.label: 纯洁思想仪式
LanguageData.IG_Thought_RoPT.stages.0.description: 仪式给予信徒纯洁而清晰的思想，使其免于感情或自我意识的干扰。
